name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in harnessing **AI** technologies to deliver high-performance solutions, particularly within the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise includes proficiency in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and cutting-edge tools such as **ChatGPT** and **Claude** for enhanced functionality. I possess strong skills in **API** development and integration, enabling seamless system interactions.

My extensive background in full-stack development encompasses frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, as well as backend technologies like **FastAPI** and **Django**. Additionally, I have substantial cloud experience on platforms such as **Azure** and **AWS**, which complements my ability to create scalable solutions. I prioritize security and compliance, understanding the intricacies of standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.

I leverage my entrepreneurial background and goal-centered mindset to drive projects forward while solving complex problems with creativity and empathy. Proactively, I lead initiatives that integrate modern tools like **Git** and automation platforms such as **N8N** to optimize development workflows and enhance productivity.

experience.responsibilities:

- Strategized the re-architecture of monolithic applications to microservice architectures using **Docker** and **Kubernetes (1.21-1.22)**, improving deployment speed by **40%**.
- Optimized large-scale data ingestion and storage using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, handling up to **10 million** records efficiently.
- Built and maintained MLOps pipelines with **MLflow** and **Apache Airflow**, enabling continuous training and deployment while reducing model deployment time by **30%**.
- Designed robust enterprise-level DevOps pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, which included automated linting and security scans across multiple environments for both web and API services.
- Delivered insightful financial data visualization tools with **D3.js** and **Chart.js**, facilitating real-time insights that influenced strategic decisions.
- Established extensive test strategies with tools like **Jest** and **Cypress**, ensuring comprehensive coverage across both front-end and back-end services, maintaining a **95%** or higher test pass rate.
- Integrated advanced search capabilities through **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch**, enhancing access to millions of health and financial records, significantly improving retrieval times.

Demonstrated problem-solving skills by leading the development and modernization of financial platforms, leveraging **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to adopt a microservices-based architecture that improved scalability, maintainability, and throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
Utilized **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and frameworks such as **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js** to build dynamic, user-focused front-end applications, enhancing user experience through responsive and performant interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Employed creativity in developing real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**; enabled operations teams to track financial activity, detect anomalies, and generate actionable insights with visualizations.
Integrated messaging services including **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to establish a robust event-driven architecture, enhancing asynchronous communication and real-time event processing, thereby supporting more than **1000** transactions per second.
Engineered and orchestrated ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from both internal and third-party sources, processing over **1TB** of data weekly.
Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns and user behavior to proactively flag suspicious activities in banking systems, achieving a detection rate improvement of **30%**.
Created machine learning pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference directly into backend services to enhance real-time decision-making processes.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Applied **AI** technologies to engineer real-time features using WebSockets and event-driven architecture powered by Kafka and RabbitMQ, enhancing order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.
Leveraged **Git** for version control and collaborative development, maintaining smooth project workflows across a team of engineers.
Employed **API** integrations for frontend applications built using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **Redux Toolkit**, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Implemented data storage solutions using **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, ensuring fast and fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows, achieving performance gains by caching frequently accessed resources.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines with **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings and optimize search relevance, improving conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data.
Executed Redis caching strategies for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, which significantly improved application responsiveness and reduced read pressure on databases by **30%**.
Utilized **Git** for source code management to facilitate team collaboration and maintain version control across development tasks.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and effective risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Designed responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3** + **Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
Developed secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring tokenized transactions and PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring **GDPR** compliance and robust user data protection throughout the platform.
